game.name: Penalty Shooting
game.description:
In the football game, when every other effort to have an edge over each team even after playing extra time results into vain, the last resort to decide the match happen to be penalty shootout. In this sports game for free for soccer games online you have to kick at least five times football into goal post to decide the fate of the game.

In this five levels game, in the first level you are required make five goals, in the second level the number of goals should be six, in third level it must be seven and so on. For every goal, there 10 points are given to the player. You must keep in your mind that never kick ball in middle, otherwise, you can resort to kicking the ball from corners. Kicking the ball in from middle only land it into the hands of goal keeper. So with the help of mouse and positioning of appearing shoe on the corner helps you to goal maximum.

At the same time, it is necessary to notice the movement of goal keepers as well, because he keeps on moving very rapidly in free sport and games online. Always on the basis of instinct kick ball the opposite direction of goal keeper and win the match in your favour. For the good kick, even, the points are given are too become 20 as well.
game.metaTitle: Penalty Shooting, Soccer  Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Penalty shooting is another interesting and loved one game under the category of soccer playing, where, the fate of the game is being judged on the basis of your penalty.
